LC_Blacksmith_1 description: Hello Kiddo. I've heard you've been making quite a mess of things around here. I can provide you with materials that you can turn into other whatever you need. However I would like to be able to work comfortably. With that said, get me some tools and I will teach you a thing or two.
LC_Blacksmith_1 completePlayerMessage: Gee thanks kiddo. Your reward as promised.
LC_Blacksmith_1 successMessageText: Gee thanks kiddo. Your reward as promised.
